ygData.subject: Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: Looks like I m in the running for crappiest system on the list.  Do I get a reward or anything if thats the case? CPU: P2 300mhz RAM: 128 MB Video Card (and
ygData.messageBody:
Looks like I'm in the running for crappiest system on the list. Do I get a
reward or anything if thats the case?

CPU: P2 300mhz
RAM: 128 MB
Video Card (and RAM): Diamond Viper V550
Video Resolution: 800x600
Sound Card: SB Live
HD speed (rpm):7200
'Net speed:cable modem
Geographic Location: Hawaii
Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing: enabled
Particle Effects: enabled
Mip Mapping: disabled
Clip plane distance: 50%

How many songs can you twist? 3
Do you slow down when it rains? always
How about in Unrest or Kunark? Kunark yes, haven't been in Unrest in so long
can't remember

Galtin of E'ci




Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
